altername_name: Simple Characters 2000 Series Vol. 05: HighSchool Kimengumi: The Table Hockey
name: Simple Character 2000 Series Vol. 05: High School Kimengumi: The Table Hockey
overview: The Playstation game is a Table Hockey game that features characters from the manga. The player can choose (at first time) from one of the 5 main characters and have to defeat different characters in the story mode to unlock the gallery mode. The gameplay the player that reach 7 goals first win the match or have more goals than the other at the end of the time. There are also special attacks and special items to active them.
